profile.name: VIGNESH J
profile.title: PYTHON ENGINEER | 3 YEAR
profile.summary: Experienced Data Engineer with deep expertise in Python, data pipeline design, and real-time streaming architectures across Windows and Linux environments. Proficient in developing scalable data systems using Kafka, Airflow, Redis, and gRPC/REST APIs, with hands-on experience in automation, data modeling, and ETL/ELT workflows.

experience.description: Realtime sensor monitoring to the copper-foil manufacturing company, where we used the data pipline mqtt->kafka->redis->grpc which all micro-service run in docker orchestration
experience.technologies: Polars, Postgres DB, Delta Lake, Grpc, Websocket, Redis, Docker, Deltalake

experience.description: Created 1020 CAE model for machine learning using automation script and worked on end to end digital twin application to the boiler to optimize the coal and cost of thermal power plant
experience.technologies: Flask, Cassandra, Rest, celery, batch script, inno setup

experience.description: Developed a real-time chat application enabling users to send instant messages, create group chats, and share multimedia content.

achievements: Recognized for academic excellence and maintaining a CGPA of 8.5 in my college.
Developed Agentic AI for text to sql query generator for multiple databases connections.
